charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1101_010:
In town, [Name:PlayerNickname ] found Colress
closing in on Sonia.
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_020:
You’re Professor Sonia, the granddaughter of
Professor Magnolia, who’s researching the
Dynamax phenomenon...
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_030:
The one who’s also studying the legends of
Galar, right?
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_050: In that case, there’s something I’d like to ask you!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_070: Looks like she might need some help.
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_080: Maybe I can lend Professor Sonia a hand.
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_090: Hey, mind if I join in?
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_110:
Oh my, you’re Professor Sycamore, researcher of
Mega Evolution!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_140:
Precisely! I am researching what brings out the
strength of Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_150:
Interesting research topic! Could you tell me a
bit more?
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_170:
I’ve been researching the potential of Pokémon in
different regions.
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_180:
Through this, I have found that what brings out the
strength of a Pokémon is...
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_190:
the bond and chemistry with its Trainer! At least
that’s what I believe!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_200:
I’m currently focusing on the so-called sync pair
relationship, which is unique to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_210:
I think Pasio is going to take my research to
the next level. I can feel it!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_220:
Interesting. So your partner Pokémon is
Klinklang, right?
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_230:
Yes! I chose the Pokémon most suitable for
collecting data!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_250:
But even if the data says most suitable, battles
never go as expected.
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_260: I’ve seen so many cases like that.
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_270:
Exactly! That’s what’s difficult but fascinating
about Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_280:
So I’d appreciate it if you could help me collect
data by battling with me!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_290:
I’ve already checked that we can use our
sync move!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_300:
I used a machine to test the strength of our bond,
and it was sufficiently strong!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_310: And now we will find out if this hypothesis is true!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_320: Join me, Professor Sonia and Professor Sycamore!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_340: I’ll help you out as much as you need!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_360:
Could you help me out as well,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? The tougher my
opponents are, the better the data I can collect!
charaepi_ch0191_00_achroma/2301_1201_410: Very well! Let’s start the battle!
